1.content:
It was a warm morning in the Kalos region, our heroes were from their voyage in the Pokemon Center of a road, in the back of the center young inventor and Lumiose city gym leader Clemont was working on a gun-like device next to him was Kanto trainer Ash Ketchum watching as Clemont worked on the machine, their Pokemon Pikachu and Dedenne were there to help Clemont with his invention.
"Just a couple a tweaks more and this thing should be ready..." Clemont said while tightening some screws.
"Hey Clemont." Ash says walking up to him.
"What is it Ash?" The blonde boy asked.
"What were you doing again?" He asks.
Clemont adjusted his glasses and chuckled. He got off the ground holding the device.
"This is the "Growth enhancing ray gun" this this little gadget we'll be able to make things go thrice their sizes!" Clemont exclaimed
"Wow!" Ash exclaimed excitedly.
"I created it to make our food bigger since we've been eating a lot lately. Well, it's time for the test!" Clemont give two cables to Pikachu and Dedenne "I'm going to need you guys, when i say "Go" you will shock these cables. Understood?"
"Pika!" "Denne!" The electric types nodded.
"Great!" Clemont exclaimed, he then connected the other end of the cables to the gun and got an apple out of his pocket "Ash, please take this apple and place it away on the floor"
"Right!" Ash said smiling, he ran 5 meters away and placed the apple on the floor.
Clemont pressed some buttons on the gun "It's the apple ready?" he asked.
"Yup." Ash says smiling.
Clemont turned the gun on "Go!" he screamed, Pikachu and Dedenne electrocuted the cables and Clemont pulled the gun's trigger and shoot at the apple, the apple started to grow "It's working!" Clemont exclaimed in happiness.
"Science is so amazing!" Ash said with sparkles in his eyes.
Suddenly the gun started twitching and cracking open.
"Uh-oh" Clemont said "I-I think it's going to-" Before Clemont could say anything else the gun exploded and a giant green ray shoot out. The giant ray hit Ash in the chest, he fell to the ground due to the force of the ray.
Ash slowly shrank to the size of a hand.
The explosion caused a giant cloud of smoke and after it cleared out Clemont immediately ran to Ash
"Ash! Are you okay?!" The blonde looked around for Ash not realizing he had shrunk.
"Hey!" Clemont looked around, h heard a rather tiny voice but he couldn't find the source.
"Help me!" Ash calls up from the ground.
Pikachu and Dedenne also ran to Ash "PikaPi!" Pikachu said worriedly
Clemont noticed this and looked at the ground "Ash?" Clemont bend down to pick up Ash and saw that apple had grown up "The gun actually worked..." he muttered. Clemont picked Ash up and realized how little he was "Oh no..." Clemont said.
"What happened to me? Why am I so tiny?" Ash asked.
"The polarity of the gun must have inverted when it exploded, instead of making you big, it made you tiny" Clemont explained
"Pikapi... " Pikachu looked sadly at his tiny trainer.
" D-Don't worry Pikachu, I can fix this! " Clemont exclaimed. "I-I just need to rebuild the gun and everything will be fine!" He continued "But..."
"But?" Ash asked.
"It'll take like... three or four hours... or maybe... a day... or two..." Clemont scratched the back of his head.
"Clemont!" Ash screamed.
"I know, I know, I promise I'll work as fast and hard as I can to get back to normal, just trust in me"
Ash frowned and sighed "You are my friend and I trust you" Ash said with a smile.
Clemont smiled back, then he heard a flock of Fletchling flying by, he quickly covered the tiny Ash with his hands and looked at the sky.
"You can't be here outside" Clemont as he began walking to the Pokemon center "Some Flying type Pokemon can snatch you away, someone need to take care of you while I work" He told Pikachu and Dedenne to stay outside and he entered the center.
Clemont had to get Ash to a safe place, he needed someone to take care of he little friend...

But who?
1.title: Ash's adventure begins!

choices: Down, in the direction of her legs
11.content:
Nurse Joy would probably freak out if she saw the little boy and his little sister Bonnie, wasn't the most responsible person he knew...
Serena seemed like the best option in this situation.
Clemont walked to the rooms of the Pokemon center checking that no one could see the tiny boy in his hands, he walked to a door that had the number 45 marked on it.
"I hope she doesn't freak out..." Clemont knocked on the door and after bit of time his and Ash's friend Serena opened the door, the girl wore her normal outfit minus her trademarked pink hat, also, she wasn't wearing any type of socks, so she was showing most of her bare legs.
"Hey, Clemont" Serena greeted her friend, who look a little worried "...What's wrong?"
Clemont looked around in order to reassure that no one was watching them, he then showed Serena his hands and the little boy that was in them.
"H-Hi Serena" Ash waved.
Serena stood there in shock, he looked at the tiny boy then at Clemont
"I-Is that...?"
Clemont nodded sadly "Something went wrong in n experiment and now Ash is tiny"
Serena almost fainted when she heard that "C-Can you fix him?!" She asked loudly.
"Of course I can!" Clemont replied "But I need you to take care of him while I work, he can be in danger if I keep him"
Serena quickly grabbed Ash "I'll take care of him" She said "Just go and fix this!"
"R-Right!" Clemont ran down the hallway, fearing that Serena would get mad a him.
The performer quickly closed the door and gently placed Ash on the bed.
"Are you alright, Ash? Did you get hurt?" Serena asked, obviously concerned. Ash stood on the bed ad stretched a little.
"I'm fine, just a little agitated" Ash said calmly.
"You should lay down, I'm not sure if the shrinking will affect your health" Serena was pretty worried for Ash, the boy noticed and decided to lay down and relax "I'm fine don't worry about it!" He gave Serena a reassuring smile, the girl wasn't buying it, though.
"How did you became so small?" Serena asked with high curiosity and Ash explained about Clemont's invention.
"Oh, that Clemont..." Serena said with annoyance on her voice "he could have you killed!"
Ash sweatdropped, "Don't worry about that, Serena! He'll fix it, I'm sure!"
Serena sighed "You should rest a little bit" She stood up and walked to the bathroom "I'll be right back" she said before entering.
Ash closed his eyes and slowly drifted into sleep.

Ash woke up and looked around him, he realized that he was still tiny and there was something next to him, he stood up and saw that Serena had fallen asleep too, she had keep her distance but she was still close, Ash noticed that she had a pair of pink earbuds on her, well... ears, so maybe she wasn't planning on falling asleep, but she did eventually did.

Ash began walking...
11.title: Going with Serena!

111.content:
For some reason, Ash began to walk down, his mind was completely blank and he was't thinking straight, he only thought about how cute Serena looked while she was sleeping, then he noticed her bare legs at the distance, they twitched a little bit but other than that they were completely still. Ash blushed as he admired Serena's long legs, the were quite a sight, specially from the angle Ash could see, the boy turned his head and saw her feet, from the distance he was he could only see her toes and pink-painted toenails, the boy got curios and ran to see how her feet looked like, after running for a bit he reached her feet. They were the most beautiful pair of feet Ash had ever see. The soles looked softer than a pillow and her toenails were painted a bright pink, those things were begging to be touched, Ash blushed more then ever, her feet looked so pretty. He then realized... He could do whatever he wanted, with them, but...


What can he do?
111.title: Down, in the direction of her legs

choices: Serena moved while she was sleeping.....
112.content:
The view was actually astonishing for the Pallet Town trainer. Here he was, staring at her gigantic companion. It seems she went to to the bathroom to get more comfortable as she was wearing her lavender hoodie and dark pink shorts which revealed her long legs. Ash always thought that Serena was a cute girl but now seeing her from this point of view.....she looked completely beautiful. This was a first time for him, he was actually feeling aroused at the sight of the beautiful girl who was sleeping peacefully.

"I shouldn't look her like that...." He said to himself but the task was impossible. Specially when he noticed her chest rising with each breath she took. They were really enticing......so much that Ash was attracted to the them.

When he was now on her chest area, he could feel how warm Serena felt and he was tempted to touch the soft fabric of her hoodie to feel the softness of her breast. He was fighting his new awoken desires, but he failed when he sank his hands on her left boob. It was amazing! The feeling was so great that he got tranced on the task of fondling Serena.

"Ahhhhh...." He suddenly heard the voice of the girl.....a cute moan escaped from her mouth and he could only blush because of it. That motivated him to go for more and began to hug her gigantic breast with a hug, snuzzling his face on her chest. But, would this wake her up? What would be her reaction? He was going to retreat when suddenly.......
112.title: to her chest

choices: Take out her hoodie so Ash could explore her mountains
Grab little Ash and start to make out with him
Grab Ash and begin to undress him like a toy
1121.content:
Ash was having his doubts about what he was doing, feeling the gigantic breast of her traveling companion. He was really aroused but her moan for some reason recovered his composture. He decided to stop and go to sleep, but when he turned back to begin his way to the pillow....he encountered two blue orbs staring at him.

She was really surprised at what she was witnessing and feeling at the moment, her crush was actually fondling her breast. She of course began to blush because of it but.....inside her....she was enjoying it. Both of them stared at each other in silence, not knowing how to break the ice between them. Ash could only gamble on Serena's kindness. Unlike her other friends, she was the one with more patience with him....so he could only count on it.

"Serena.....I am sorry.....I did something...." But he was stopped when the gigantic finger of the honer hair girl started to touch his little body up and down. He was surprised at her reaction, specially when her finger was now stroking his crotch which violently arised because of the feeling.

"I...do not mind Ash.....But I actually also want to feel you....." She kept rubbin in between his pants until she felt how his bulge rised which made her happy, she was attractive for him.

"You are not angry?"

"No silly, in fact....I would love if you continue....." That was all that the kantonian needed to hear to let his wild side unleashed. He ran to her gigantic breast again and began to hug it and rub it. He was feeling heaven, specially when her nipple arised within the fabric of her hoodie. Serena's breath was heavy at the feeling of her tiny crush lusting over her......until she decided to.....
1121.title: Serena woke up.....aroused......

12.content:
Clemont decided that his little sister, Bonnie would be the best and (probably the only) choice. He didn't wanted to freak Serena or Nurse Joy out and Bonnie was already accustomed to see his brother doing weird stuff.
The blonde boy walked to the rooms of the Pokemon center checking that no one could see the tiny boy in his hands, he walked to a door that had the number 43 in it.
"I hate doing this but she's our only option..." Clemont knocked on the door and after bit of time his little sister Bonnie opened the door, the little girl looked like she had recently woken up from a nap, she was also barefoot.
Bonnie yawned and rubbed her eye "What is it, bro?"
Clemont just stood there staring at her.
"What happened? Did another of your inventions blew up" She asked, Clemont then showed her his hands and the little boy that was in them.
"Hey Bonnie!" Ash said.
Bonnie stared at the boy with wide open eyes "I-It's that a robot o-or a clone or-"
"This is the real Ash" Clemont interrupted her "I shrunk him by accident..."
"You... Dummy!" Bonnie took Ash way from Clemont's hands "Are you okay, Ash?" she asked.
"Don't worry, I'm okay." Ash says smiling.
"I just need you to take care of him while I work on my growing ray, I'm going to need Dedenne too"
Bonnie glared at his brother and nodded. "Don't worry Ash, this meanie won't hurt you anymore" Bonnie stared at Clemont and puffed her cheeks a little..
Clemont groaned "Just... Don't let anything happen to him" He turned away and went outside.
Bonnie entered her room and closed the door behind her "Nobody will bothers us in my room" She happily exclaimed.
Since the Pokemon center was nearly empty Clemont manage to get an individual room for each of his friends.
The little girl sat crossed leg on her bed and gently placed Ash in front of her who also sat, she observed Ash and how tiny he really was, for some reason it fascinated her.
"How does it feel to be so small?" she asked curiously.
"Well... not that different from being normal size"
"Wow... Really?" Bonnie asked.
"Yeah"
Bonnie smiled "You look cute, if you where a Pokemon I would definitely catch you~"
"Uh... Thanks" Ash didn't really know how to feel about that comment.
The little girl wanted to do something with Ash in order to keep them both entertained, but...

What do you want her to do?
12.title: Bonnie the caretaker!

122.content:
Then, out of nowhere, Bonnie got a playful idea, she smiled deviously.
"Aren't afraid of being stepped on? I mean my foot is bigger than you." Bonnie placed her foot right next to Ash and wiggled her cute, round toes. Ash was more or less the same size as her foot, maybe just a little smaller.
"I'll be okay as long as I stay here." Ash says.
"I don't think so~" she cooed playfully
she grinned and extended her two legs placing her feet at Ash's sides.
"Uh, What are you-"
She lightly pressed her soles together with Ash in the middle of them.
"Huh?!" Ash was surprised by this sudden action.
"How does it feel?" Bonnie asked with a giggle.
122.title: Playing with little Ash!

1221.content:
The boy blushed "Soft." he said smiling "I-I kinda like it here..."
"Glad you like it" Bonnie blushed a little and wiggled her toes on Ash's head, he blushed too.
Bonnie giggled a bit, having a small person between her sensitive feet was kind of a weird feeling, she liked it nonetheless she moved her feet around a little, the little boy didn't seemed to mind, thn Bonnie rubbed her big toe against Ash's face and hair
"Hehe" The blondie giggled cutely"Your hair tickles~"
"Oh, really?" Ash said with a grin and began to tickle Bonnie's big toe with his hands "Is somebody here ticklish?" he asked playfully.
1221.title: "Soft I-I kinda like it here..."

12212.content:
Ash attacked Bonnie's toe with his little fingers, since Bonnie's feet were rather sensitive she felt a lot of tickling sensations, but that didn't annoyed her, in fact, she liked it.
"Ehehehe~" Bonnie giggled. "This is kinda fun~" she wiggled her toes a little more.
Ash smiled at the girl. "I'm glad your having fun." He said.
"Tickle me some more! " Bonnie presses her big toe against Ash's face.
Ash grinned and tickled her big toe a lot.
"Eeheheahahaha~!" Bonnie laughed cutely and wiggled her toes even more.
The boy began to tickle all of her toes playfully.
"EHEHEHHEHHEHEHE!" The blonde girl laughed and laughed
"Having fun?" Ash asked.
"YEHEHEHES~!"
Ash smiled and tickled a little bit faster.
"I-I Hehehe lohohove thihehes~" Bonnie laughed
Bonnie released Ash and sat in front of him extending her legs and showing him her feet.
"You can keep touching if you want~" Bonnie winked
Ash tickled under her toes. "Tickle tickle!"
"Ehehe~!" The sudden tickling was a pleasing surprise for Bonnie, She blushed slightly and moved around a little.
"Ehahahahehe~" Bonnie twitched slightly to the side, pushing her foot towards Ash.
Ash then started nuzzling Bonnie's feet.
Bonnie stopped giggling and took notice of that.
"Aww~ Somebody likes my feetsies~" Bonnie giggled cutely.
Ash grinned and kept nuzzling her feet.
Bonnie really liked how Ash's tiny body felt against her sole.
"Hehehe~Mmm~"She moaned a bit.
"Having fun?" He asked.
"Mmhm!" Bonnie nodded.
"That's great!" Ash said.
The boy really liked how soft Bonnie's feet were, they felt like giant marshmallows and he just couldn't keep his hands away, the little girl felt like doing something "speacial" with Ash but...

What?
12212.title: "Ehehehe~ This is kinda fun~"

122121.content:
Bonnie then an idea, a mischievous idea. She smiled deviously as she took her feet away from Ash.
"Hm?" Ash looked at Bonnie, curious about why she took her feet away. The girl stood up on the bed and bowed a little.
"Have you ever wondered what being an insole feels like? " Bonnie asked, staring down at Ash.
"A what?" Ash asks, a little confused
"You'll find out right now! Bonnie raised her right foot and slowly brought it down, pressing the boy with it, her foot and the bed were pretty soft and Bonnie did as lightly as possible so she wouldn't hurt Ash. He blushed, he really like the texture of Bonnie's feet, it was so soft and squishy, he felt like he was being squished by a giant marshmallow. Bonnie smiled and brought her hands to her hips.
"From now on I declare you: My slave!" Bonnie said proudly and playfully "You will now obey my every command" She moved her foot a little, rubbing Ash's face with the ball of her foot.
"Really?" Ash asked as the blonde kept rubbing her ball against his cheeks.
Bonnie giggled, she placed her cute, round toes on Ash's and wiggled them "Yep, really~"

Bonnie has made Ash a slave! but...

What should she do with him?
122121.title: Trample the little boy~

choices: "Good slave, you know your place already. Now did I tell you to stop?"
"Who gave you permission to lick your Goddess's feet! You need to be punished!"
1221211.content:
Shivering from being belittled by his friends little sister, Ashe blushed before pressing his against Bonnie's toes. 'They smell kind of bad. But, I'm her slave now...' That meant he had to please her right? Feeling some of the sweat from her toes drip onto his face as the toddler continued to playfully step on him, Ash opened his mouth before even realizing it to taste it for himself. Drinking some of her perspiration, the raven haired boy blushed as he tasted the salty sour fluid. 'Gross!' So this is what her feet tasted like? Well, at least what her sweat did...

Wondering the same about her skin to, Ash blushed further before sticking his tongue out. He had to know now. Trailing his tongue between her salty toes, Ash's face turned to one of disgust again. Why did he do that?! He knew it wasn't going to taste good, so why try it from the tap! However his bizarre actions hadn't gone unnoticed. Looking down in confusion, Bonnie paused her gentle movements as she peered down between her toes.

"Huh?"
1221211.title: Ash licks Bonnie's feet!

choices: Nope, he's right where he belongs. As her toy.
Yep, her shoes are filthy and Ash can be her new Insole.
Maybe in her panties...? Something feels itchy and Ash is just the right size!
1222.content:
"B-B-Bonnie, what the heck are you doing?!" Ash cried out in shock as his friends little sister smothered him against her sweaty soles. Giggling, Bonnie moved her hands around her feet before pressing on her feet harder. "You look so cute like this! It's almost like you my little doll." She purred, her voice taking on a more guttural tone.

Coughing from between her feet as her salty foot sweat fell into his mouth, Ash began struggling with new vigor. "C-Clemont hel-" he tried to cry out before Bonnies toes surrounded his face entirely with her feet.

"Bad Ash! No taddling. This will be our little secret." She grinned before running her feet back and forth slowly. The feeling of another living being, being so helpless in her possesion, it was euphoric.

She had never felt this way before, but something felt so right about controlling the shrunken boy. It was making her quiver with glee. Scrunching her toes lightly as she watched her sweat bead up and drip between her filthy crevices, Bonnie soon shuddered.

It had to be hot in there, unbearably so. But was there anywhere worse she could put Ash? Maybe make him feel more like her plaything then her shrunken friend?
1222.title: "Ack! Bonnie stop that!"

12223.title: Maybe in her panties...? Something feels itchy ...

info.brief_description: Ash gets shrinked in size by one of Clemont's invention, What will happen to him?
info.description:
Hello everyone, this is my first attempt at an interactive story. Another of Clemont's inventions goes wrong and Ash becomes tiny, It's up to you what will happen to the little guy.
This is happens in the Kalos anime, pre X, Y and Z
I want to make some rules:
-This will be primarily foot fetish orientated, You can add more fetishes along the way if you want, all except for: Farting and death
-No heavily sexual stuff
-No killing/Dying
-Try to spell correctly
-Try to keep the characters relevant to the timeline (By that I mean, no Kanto characters out of nowhere)


Anyone can contribute in anyway, just try to keep it clean
